attributes.body:
Hi,

Thank you for filing out the Additional Information for user ${employeeName}.

Personal Details
Employee Name - ${employeeName}
Employee Number - ${employeeNumber}
User Type - #if( ${userType} == 'true')Full Time#{else}Part Time#end
Phone - ${phone}
Email - ${email}
Start Date - ${startDate}

Location
Location - ${location}
#if(${city})
City - ${city}
#end
IT Requests
Preferred Laptop - ${preferredLaptop}
#if($preferredLaptop == 'Windows')Windows OS - ${windowsOsVersion}
#end #if($preferredLaptop == 'Linux')Linux OS - ${linuxOs}
#end
Require Access to Applications :
Siebel Client - #if( ${siebel} == 'true')Yes#{else}No#end
Oracle - #if( ${oracle} == 'true')Yes#{else}No#end
Eclipse IDE - #if( ${eclipse} == 'true')Yes#{else}No#end
Adobe Acrobat - #if( ${acrobat} == 'true')Yes#{else}No#end
Adobe Photoshop - #if( ${photoshop} == 'true')Yes#{else}No#end
Microsoft Powerpoint - #if( ${powerpoint} == 'true')Yes#{else}No#end
Additional Requests - #if($additionalRequests)${additionalRequests}#{else}None#end

Additional Roles Requested: #if($roles)Yes#{else}No#end

Thank you,
IAM Team
attributes.subject: User Onboarding Form Submission Complete
